content.html:
Basic Setup


When you turn the camera on for the first time, you can
choose a language and set the camera clock. At default
settings, you can also pair the camera with a smartphone
or tablet SO that you can later synchronize the clocks or
download pictures. Follow the steps below when turning
the camera on for the first time.

2


If you intend to pair the camera with a smartphone or tablet, install
and launch the latest version of the FUJIFILM Camera Remote App on
the smart device before proceeding. For more information, visit:
http://hpp10///wwww.com/en/en/zonerg_nemence/

1 Turn the camera on.


First
Steps

A language-selection dialog will be
displayed.

2 Choose a language.
Highlight a language and press
MENU/OK.



3 Pair the camera with the smartphone or
Press MENU/OK on the camera and tap
PAIRING REGISTRATION in FUJIFILM
Camera Remote.


START MENU PAIRING REGISTRATION
PAIR WITH SMARTPHONE?
IMAGES CAN BE EASILY TRANSFERRED PAIRING
TO SMARTPHONE BY
SCAN QR CODE OR SEARCH FOR "FUJIFILM Camera Remote" APP ON THE WEB OK] SETBACKSKIP�HELP
tablet.

To skip pairing, press DISP/BACK.

40
content.markdown:
# Basic Setup

When you turn the camera on for the first time, you can
choose a language and set the camera clock. At default
settings, you can also pair the camera with a smartphone
or tablet SO that you can later synchronize the clocks or
download pictures. Follow the steps below when turning
the camera on for the first time.

# 2

If you intend to pair the camera with a smartphone or tablet, install
and launch the latest version of the FUJIFILM Camera Remote App on
the smart device before proceeding. For more information, visit:
http://hpp10///wwww.com/en/en/zonerg_nemence/

1 Turn the camera on.

First
Steps

A language-selection dialog will be
displayed.

2 Choose a language.
Highlight a language and press
MENU/OK.

![image](/image/placeholder)
ON OFF

![image](/image/placeholder)
MENU

tablet.

3 Pair the camera with the smartphone or
Press MENU/OK on the camera and tap
PAIRING REGISTRATION in FUJIFILM
Camera Remote.

| START MENU PAIRING REGISTRATION | START MENU PAIRING REGISTRATION | START MENU PAIRING REGISTRATION | START MENU PAIRING REGISTRATION | START MENU PAIRING REGISTRATION |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  |  |  |  |  |
| PAIR WITH SMARTPHONE? | PAIR WITH SMARTPHONE? | PAIR WITH SMARTPHONE? | PAIR WITH SMARTPHONE? | PAIR WITH SMARTPHONE? |
| IMAGES CAN BE EASILY TRANSFERRED PAIRING | IMAGES CAN BE EASILY TRANSFERRED PAIRING | IMAGES CAN BE EASILY TRANSFERRED PAIRING | IMAGES CAN BE EASILY TRANSFERRED PAIRING | IMAGES CAN BE EASILY TRANSFERRED PAIRING |
| TO SMARTPHONE BY | TO SMARTPHONE BY | TO SMARTPHONE BY | TO SMARTPHONE BY | TO SMARTPHONE BY |
| SCAN QR CODE OR SEARCH FOR "FUJIFILM Camera Remote" APP ON THE WEB OK] SET | BACK | SKIP | � | HELP |


To skip pairing, press DISP/BACK.

40

download pictures. Follow the steps below when turning
